name: Musical Magical Pet Otters
description:
Welcome to Musical Magical Pet Otters!

In addition to being very talented musician, these mammals may change size depending on what you feed them. Naturally, this also changes the sound of their music.

                                                                         

Left click on an item on the seafood panel on the bottom center of the screen to pick it up, and then left click again on the otter you wish to feed. Right click to deselect an item you're currently holding. 

  • Feed an otter a pufferfish to make it big and deep sounding
  • Feed an otter a guppy makes it tiny and high pitched
  • Feed an otter a crab to return it to original size and sound
  • Simply pressing it silences it until it's pressed or fed again

This game was developed for the "Virtual Pet Jam".

Art, music, coding and design by Victor Bankler
